title: NHPT Evaluation
bigTitle: Automatic Evaluation of the Nine Hole Peg Test
description: Working in the AI/ML department at Sanofi, I developed a tool capabale of evaluating a patients performance on the NHPT solely from a video of the test. The NHPT is one of the most widely used arm mobility tests in clinical practice.
linkText: Click here to see the paper

title: ASL Interpreter
description: Used machine learning to develop an American Sign Language (ASL) letter Interpreter. Obtained a 97% test accuracy on unseen test data, 95% accuracy of correctly predicting 6 letter words and includes a live video translation feature.
linkText: Click here to see the repo

title: Causal Selection
bigTitle: Improving Machine Learning Algorithms with Causal Inference
description: Developed an easy to use framework for pruning feature spaces when training ML models using Causal Inference. Improved test accuracy by up to 50% when reducing feature space by more than 50%.
linkText: Click here to see the repo

title: Rank and Select
bigTitle: SPIDER: Improved Succinct Rank and Select Performance
description: Worked with Professor Sam McCauley to develop a faster Succinct Rank and Select Data Structure. Developed theoretical algorithms, implemented, and optimized them in C. Was made first author on the paper and presented my research in a talk at the Symposium on Experimental Algorithms 2024.
linkText: Click here to view the publication

title: SoundQuest
description: Developed a local multiplayer song trivia game that generates "guess the song" style questions based on a spotify playlist. Built from scratch using react and the spotify API.
linkText: Click here to see the repo

title: WRFC Website
bigTitle: Williams College Rugby Football Club Website
description: Developed a website for my club rugby team from scratch using React and host it using AWS s3 services.
linkText: Click here to view the site

title: Stochastic Parody
description: Used F# to develop a programming language that can generate song parodies according to basic annotations
linkText: Click here to see the repo

title: Snar Delivery
bigTitle: Food Delivery App Built on SUI Blockchain
description: Used Sui Move to publish a smart contract along with React to develop a doordash-like app for Williams. Transactions are completed using the SUI crypto currency. Project was awarded 1st Place at the Williams College x Mysten Labs Hackathon 2024.
linkText: Click here to see the site

title: Mini Golf
description: Created a ray traced 3D Mini Golf game with blinn-phong lighting and realistic collisions using OpenGL
linkText: Click here to view a demo
